posts.post_title: FS T206 Orval Overall Hands Waist Level PSA 4 SOLD
posts.post_content:
One of the 1908 world champion Cubs, Orval Overall. To this day, Overall is the only player to ever record four strikeouts in one inning in a World Series game.
